text: wrjeu b'ikhwt yusif 'ilyh, faqam binafsih yftsh amtethm, fabada bamtethm qabl matae shqyqh; 'ihkamana lamaa dbbarh lastbqa' 'akhih meh, thuma aintahaa bwea' akhyh, fastkhrj al'ina' mnh, kdhlk yssarna liusuf hdha altadbir aldhy twssal bih li'akhdh akhyh, wama kan lah 'an yakhudh 'akhah fi hukm malik "msr"; li'anah lays min dinih 'ana ytmlk alsarq, 'iilaa 'an mshyyt allah aiqtadat hdha altadbir walahtkam 'iilaa shryet 'iikhwat yusuf alqadiat briqq alsarq. narfae manazil man nasha' fi aldunya ealaa ghyrh kama rfena mnzlt ywsf. wafawq kuli dhi elm man hu 'aelam mnh, hataa yantahi aleilm 'iilaa allah taealaa ealim alghayb walshhadt
